abstract: Gary Gensler, the Commodity Futures Trading Commission’s chairman, reminded Congressional Republicans that derivatives were at the center of the financial crisis.
snippet: Gary Gensler, the Commodity Futures Trading Commission’s chairman, reminded Congressional Republicans that derivatives were at the center of the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Gary Gensler, under fierce questioning from Congressional Republicans on Thursday, defended his plans to regulate the derivatives industry.

headline.main: Under Attack, Gensler Defends Derivatives Rules

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
